fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 150.75 points or 0.78% to settle at 19,564.50. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.33% to 10.68. Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Infosys (Infy) and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
